forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny. High near 74, with temperatures falling to around 72 in the afternoon. West southwest wind around 18 mph, with gusts as high as 23 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 57. West southwest wind 13 to 18 mph, with gusts as high as 23 mph.

weather_report:
The afternoon in Downtown San Francisco unfolds with a pleasant embrace of sunshine, as a clear blue sky reigns over the cityscape. With temperatures comfortably hovering around 74 degrees, a gentle west-southwest breeze carries a touch of coolness, making the air feel refreshingly crisp. The Golden Gate stands gracefully against a backdrop of fluffy clouds, the marine layer retreating, offering splendid views for those who venture out.

As evening approaches, expect the warmth to slowly yield to the night, with temperatures dipping to a mild 57 degrees. The welcoming glow of the city lights begins to sparkle, hinting at the allure of outdoor strolls along the Embarcadero or a cozy coffee shop visit. Dressing in layers is advisable; an easy transition from a longsleeve top to a light sweater or jacket will keep you comfortable as the evening coolness sets in. Tonight offers a perfect canvas for unwinding—take to the streets, perhaps for a reflective walk, enjoying the city's gentle sounds, or gathering with friends under the soft glow of the sunset that paints the sky in hues of orange and purple.
